titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989 for the Inter-American Foundation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1274 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 3/19/1987--Introduced. Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1969 to authorize appropriations for the Inter-American Foundation for FY 1988 and 1989.
